other_tests.findings: Consistently ran between 7.0 and 8.3 µg/ml prior to nefazodone introduction; elevated to 10.8 µg/ml after nefazodone initiation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After reducing carbamazepine dose by 200 mg, the serum level decreased to 10.2 µg/ml one week later; further reduction led to a final level of 7.4 µg/ml.

other_tests.findings: Serum levels ranged between 5.2 and 6.2 µg/ml before nefazodone introduction; elevated to 15.1 µg/ml 14 days after starting nefazodone.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After reducing carbamazepine dose to 200 mg t.i.d., serum level fell to 5.8 µg/ml within 5 days.
